chunk:
Wild Rose Refresh, Stimulating Facial Serum

Brand: Wild

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Brand: Wild

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Vitus vinifera (grapeseed) oil, Camelina sativa seed oil,* Tocopherol (non-gmo vitamin e), Jasminum officinale (jasmine) extract,* essential oils of Mentha piperita (peppermint),* Lavandula angustifolia (lavender),* Citrus limon (lemon)* and Daucus carota (carrot)*
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
